Name: Sentris
About the game: Sentris is a musical performance game. Make your own music as you Drop, Recycle, and Stack 'Sound Blocks' into a spinning loop. Freestyle with a huge degree of musical control. Or focus on achieving the goal and let your song emerge organically. * Experimental music-based gameplay that enables personal expression and creativity * Deceptively simple, challenging, and deep * Play and Remix 20 levels with 12 musical voices, 12 key signatures, 7 musical modes, and up to 400 beats per minute * Freestyle to perform the game like a musical instrument * Export your loops to .wav and use them in other music/audio software * Endless mode with infinite musical emergence
